com.facebook.litho

Class DebugComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.DebugComponent

  • public final class DebugComponent
extends Object
    A DebugComponent represents a node in Litho's component hierarchy. DebugComponent removes the need to worry about implementation details of whether a node is represented by a Component or a ComponentLayout. The purpose of this class is for tools such as Stetho's UI inspector to be able to easily visualize a component hierarchy without worrying about implementation details of Litho.

      • getChildComponents

        public List<DebugComponent> getChildComponents()
        Get the list of components composed by this component. This will not include any Views that are mounted by this component as those are not components. Use this#getMountedView for that.
        Returns:
        A list of child components.

      • getAllTextContent

        public String getAllTextContent()
        Returns:
